divs: Sighting DetailsI went out on my deck last night at 10:30 PM to get in the hot tub and I noticed that the star I usually see in the North-NorthEast sky was unsually large and bright - the size and brightness of Venus. The area of the sky that I can see from my deck is limited, so I am pretty familar with this section of stars. The star stayed stationary for about 15 minutes then just started moving downward! I was shocked to say the least. It moved slowly down and out of sight behind the trees. I was able to watch it for about 6 seconds after it started moving. The sighting lasted about 15 minutes. I watched the sky for a couple more minutes to see if it would appear again but it didn't. This did not behave like a satellite or plane. I am a field investigator so there is no need to assign this case - I can close it out if Debbie wants me to.
Summary: Planet size UFO was stationary then moved slowly down and out of sight.
trends: There have been 67 other sightings in Independence
There were no other sightings in Independence on or around June 29th 2009
